_metadata.description: Cache for ORCID author information to avoid repeated lookups

_instructions.usage: Maps author names to ORCID IDs and institutional information
_instructions.format: author_name -> {orcid_id, orcid_uri, given_name, family_name, affiliation, verified}
_instructions.maintenance: Add new author mappings as they are discovered during processing
_instructions.verification: Mark entries as verified when ORCID ID is confirmed from official sources
